class.name: TwitchAnalyticsRequests
class.brief_description: Twitch Analytics API for extension and game analytics reports.
class.description: TwitchAnalyticsRequests provides methods for retrieving analytics reports for extensions and games. Requires analytics:read:extensions or analytics:read:games OAuth scopes. Access through [method TwitchAPI.get_analytics].

method.name: get_extension_analytics
method.description: Gets analytics reports for one or more extensions. Optional [param params] can include extension_id, type, started_at, ended_at, and first. Results are returned via the [signal TwitchAPI.request_completed] signal with signal_name "extension_analytics_received". [b]Response includes:[/b] Array of objects with extension_id, URL (CSV download link), type, date_range (started_at, ended_at). [codeblock] var params = {"extension_id": "my_extension_id", "type": "overview_v2"} TwitchAPI.get_analytics().get_extension_analytics(params) # Response: {"data": [{"extension_id": "my_extension_id", "URL": "https://twitch.tv/...", "type": "overview_v2", "date_range": {"started_at": "2025-10-01T00:00:00Z", "ended_at": "2025-10-16T00:00:00Z"}}]} [/codeblock]

method.name: get_game_analytics
method.description: Gets analytics reports for one or more games. Optional [param params] can include game_id, type, started_at, ended_at, and first. Results are returned via the [signal TwitchAPI.request_completed] signal with signal_name "game_analytics_received". [b]Response includes:[/b] Array of objects with game_id, URL (CSV download link), type, date_range (started_at, ended_at). [codeblock] var params = {"game_id": "509658"} TwitchAPI.get_analytics().get_game_analytics(params) # Response: {"data": [{"game_id": "509658", "URL": "https://twitch.tv/...", "type": "overview_v2", "date_range": {"started_at": "2025-10-01T00:00:00Z", "ended_at": "2025-10-16T00:00:00Z"}}]} [/codeblock]
